actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings concluded. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 99-184.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered favorably reported an original bill (S. 1003) in lieu of this measure.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1986 and 1987.
short_title: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1986 and 1987

summary.text: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1986 and 1987 - Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for FY 1986 and 1987 for the Board for International Broadcasting.

titles.title: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1986 and 1987
A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1986 and 1987.
